link Worked with offnet providers to troubleshoot connectivity issues with circuits or vendor supplied Customer Premises Equipment CPE Participated in the Maintenance window for Network Engineering configuration and troubleshooting of network devices including Cisco switches routers firewalls Good knowledge about how to build a network with great efficiency in service from the service provider
